statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_condition FROM PatientData WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%Diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_history FROM PatientData WHERE age <= 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_condition FROM PatientData WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE treatment_history LIKE '%surgery%' AND medical_condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM PatientData WHERE age < 18 OR age > 65 ORDER BY gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM treatment_data ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, effectiveness_rating FROM treatment_data WHERE treatment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE age <= 30;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'male' ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT treatment_name, effectiveness_rating, treatment_date FROM treatment_data WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, age DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, t.effectiveness_rating FROM patient_records p INNER JOIN treatment_data t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY t.effectiveness_rating DESC, p.patient_name ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate, MAX(blood_pressure) AS max_blood_pressure FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING MAX(heart_rate) > 80;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, MIN(treatment_date) AS earliest_treatment_date FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT treatment_name, description, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100;
SELECT record_date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, effectiveness_rate FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatments ON MedicalRecords.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT patient_name, height, weight, blood_pressure FROM Patients LEFT JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, prescription FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure, weight FROM HealthData WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT p.patient_name, m.doctor_name FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id
SELECT * FROM HealthData WHERE weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY data_date DESC
SELECT p.patient_name, t.medication, o.outcome FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id
